    • Method Detail

      • readInvestigatorsTextFile

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Investigator> readInvestigatorsTextFile()
        Function that reads and validates the .txt that holds information about investigators.
        Returns:
        a HashMap that maps for each investigator id its correspondent investigator object.

      • readInvestigationGroupsTextFile

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,InvestigationGroup> readInvestigationGroupsTextFile(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Investigator> investigators)
        Function that reads and validates the .txt which holds information about investigation groups.
        Parameters:
        investigators - the previous parsed investigators list, as a needed dependency.
        Returns:
        a HashMap that maps for each investigator group name its correspondent investigator group object.

      • readPublicationsTextFile

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Publication> readPublicationsTextFile(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Investigator> investigators)
        Function that reads and validates the .txt which holds information about publications.
        Parameters:
        investigators - the previous parsed investigators list, as a needed dependency.
        Returns:
        a HashMap that maps for each publication title its correspondent publication object.

      • resolveInvestigators

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Investigator> resolveInvestigators(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Investigator> investigators)
        Function that resolves and validates some unfilled investigator fields, such as investigationGroup, after reading the text files.
        Parameters:
        investigators - the investigators mapping to be resolved.
        Returns:
        the resolved investigators mapping.

      • writeEntityObjectFile

        public int writeEntityObjectFile(java.util.HashMap entities,
                                 java.io.File objectFile)
        Function that writes an HashMap of entities into a given object file.
        Parameters:
        entities - the HashMap to be serialized.
        objectFile - the target object file.
        Returns:
        1 - if the file was written. 0 - otherwise.

      • readEntityObjectFile

        public java.util.HashMap readEntityObjectFile(java.io.File objectFile)
        Function that reads an HashMap of entities from a given object file.
        Parameters:
        objectFile - the object file to be read.
        Returns:
        the entities HashMap that was read.
